enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Review and roster of experts in relation to third national communications:
sentences: Chair Ashe noted that these communications are due by 30 November 2001.
The decision (FCCC/SBI/2001/L.5), adopted by the COP on 9 November, requests the Secretariat to prepare the compilation and synthesis of national communications at COP-8.
